Row.Text: Oh, How the Turn Tables Turn
As Timor-Leste, take Indonesia's Original capital
Achievements for mods created by JakeWalrusWhale
Gain Global Support From the UN

Your country is struggling with the latest war, as troops have been lost and cities have been taken. Fortunately, you have the option to go to the United Nations with the issue, and popularize it throughout the world. Doing this may help you recieve support from other civilizations. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Timor-Leste [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be at War [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have the "Penicilin" Tech [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]700 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities that have been lost by you in the last 10 turns will return to you [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 [ICON_WAR] "FALINTIL" appear to defend your capital

People everywhere have heard about your struggles, and they have been urging their leaders to intervene for the sake of peace. The United Nations have called to help out your cause, and other leaders have listened and have lent you their support. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities that have been lost by you in the last 10 turns will return to you [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 [ICON_WAR] "FALINTIL" appear to defend your capital

Oil has been discovered in our territory, and the amount of it is very numerous! Oil has become one of our greatest incomes. However, your advisers recommend allocating the surplus wealth from oil into a fund to be used by the government. This could mean much more wealth for you and your people! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Timor-Leste [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have the "Refrigeration" tech [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 5 [ICON_RES_OIL] Offshore Platforms [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]500 [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each plot with [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil will yield an additional 5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold

And thus the Timor-Leste Petroleum Fund was established, and the surplus income is predicted to skyrocket over the years. This wealth could help us win many battles! [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each plot with [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil will yield an additional 5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold
Our people are now reliant on oil and asking the United Nations for support. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
We are glad to see that your people are reliant on oil and asking the United Nations for support. The amazing works of our civilization are truly inspiring!
